page.title: 08The Red Hart Inn
page.content: MR HOWLE HAS OWNED THE PUB FOR ONLY NINE MONTHS.PREVIOUSLY HE WAS A PUB MANAGER FOR .A BIG BREWERY.THE GIRLS ASKED IF HE HAD DONE ANY ALTERATIONS.HE TOLD THEM THAT THE TOILETS HAD BEEN IMPROVED .MRS HOWLES DOES ALL THE CATERING.THEIR MOST POPULAR MEAL IS RUMP STEAK AND HE SELLS MANY HOME MADE PIES.IN THE SEASON THEY COOK LOCALLY CAUGHT SALMON.THERE ARE SIX PART TIME STAFF IN THE BAR AND THREE FULL TIME STAFF IN THE KITCHEN.IN THE MIDDLE OF THE MAIN ROOM IS A WELL.THE LANDLORD PUT THE LIGHT ON AND WE SAW IT WAS ABOUT TWENTY FEET DEEP WITH FOUR FEET OF WATER,BUT AFTER LAST RAINY NOVEMBER THE WATER ROSE NEARLY TO THE TOP.AN OLD WALL WAS BUILT WITH BRANCHES LIKE A HEDGE.THERE IS A BEAUTIFUL ROSE GARDEN WITH BENCHES AND AN OLD DINGHY FOR CHILDREN TO PLAY IN.
